vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a new Specific Use Permit for a public school other than an open-enrollment charter school on property zoned R-7.5(A) Single-Family District, on property bounded by East Ledbetter Drive, Veterans Drive, 52nd Street, and Horizon Drive
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to a site plan, traffic management plan, and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a site plan, traffic management plan, and conditions 
Z245-154(TB)/Z-25-000003

*In alignment with ForwardDallas.
